name: 2022 6th International Conference on Intelligent Traffic and Transportation
content: Paper Publication: Papers submitted to ICITT 2022 will be sent to at least two technical conference committee members and international reviewers for peer review, accepted and presented papers will be included into a volume of the Advances in Transdisciplinary Engineering book series, published by IOS Press. The book series is indexed by EI Compendex, and Scopus.
